channel.title: Oceans on Science in Progress
channel.description: Recent content in Oceans on Science in Progress

item.title: #7 Priya Shukla - Lab managing and grad school
item.description: In this episode, I sit down with Priya Shukla of UC Davis’ Bodega Marine Lab. Over the past couple of years, Priya has worked as lab manager for the Ocean Acidification group at BML. Recently, she accepted a spot in UC Davis’ Ecology PhD program! Priya discusses what it’s like to work as a lab manager (for 3 different labs at once!) and what it was like applying to grad school amidst all the work at BML.
